HomePage.short-bio: I specialize in creating elegant application interfaces and modern fullstack websites.

Services.frontend-desc: I create modern, responsive, and intuitive user interfaces using the latest frontend tools and technologies, ensuring a seamless user experience across different devices.
Services.fullstack-desc: I build complex web solutions - from frontend to backend. I provide fast, secure sites with built-in customized content management system, providing best user and admin experience.
Services.seo-desc: I optimize websites for search engines, enhancing visibility, rankings, and driving more organic traffic, leading to improved business outcomes and increased user conversions.
Services.logo-desc: I design unique and professional logos that not only stand out visually but also accurately reflect the brand's identity and values, helping to build its recognition.

Resume.my-experience-desc: Since 2019, I professionally code modern web applications, and I still plan to do it for many years to come, as it is not only my job, but also a passion.
Resume.my-education-desc: By education, I am a civil engineer, but nevertheless, I decided to change the industry. I was able to do this effectively thanks to a large number of professional courses. List below contains only the most important ones.
Resume.my-skills-desc: Web development requires to be up to date with the latest technologies. Here is the list of ones that I've mastered.
Resume.about-me-desc: Hi, I'm Krystian and since 2019 I have been professionally developing web applications. I am convinced that the key to success is transforming complex requirements into a simple, elegant form that brings value to both users and business. I am enthusiastic and eager to support the implementation of projects that will benefit and satisfy both you and the users of your applications.
Resume.name: Name

Projects.income-manager-desc: A tool to convert foreign revenues into PLN.
Projects.natours-desc: The landing page is full of modern design and good-looking animations.
Projects.tax-tool-desc: An app to calculate taxes to be paid in Poland from foreign income.

Contact.lets-work-desc: I look forward to hearing from you - together, we can create something exceptional!
Contact.email-thanks: I will respond as soon as possible. Thank you.
Contact.email-error: Sorry, we are doing the best we can. Please try again later.
